Subject: Request for release of funds deposited by TIBIEL on Escrow Account for September deliveries

 

 

Dear Biliana / Dear Iskra,

 

We have completed our September deliveries to TIBIEL. We therefore send you our attached documents issued as per contract 2620TS000019 and according to the Escrow Agreement & Addendum, together with our release request for funds deposited on the Escrow Account.

 

The statement of deliveries is showing all quantities submitted in September: 800’000 KWh/day (totally 24’000 MWh). 

 

Please confirm that the attached documents are in order and transfer the amount of EUR 264,074.40 to our Kolmar NL B.V. account with Credit Europe Bank N.V. Amsterdam in line with our attached instructions. 

 

Please confirm the balance left on the Escrow account after payment in order to obtain TBL’s agreement to keep the balance on the Escrow account.

 

 

Thanks and best regards,

Silvia Lüdin
